6.63: Reduced  Tombstone armor from 10 to 4.  Flesh Golem Reduced own health as heal per hero death from 12% to 6%. Reduced own health as heal per non-hero death from 3% to 2%.
6.60: Reduced base armor from 5 to 2 (total armor is now 3.4).  Tombstone no longer spawns zombies for units in the fog of war.
6.66: Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Undying: Increases  Flesh Golem max damage amplification from 20%/25%/30% to 25%/30%/35%, own health as heal per hero death from 6% to 10% and own health as heal per non-hero death from 2% to 3%.
6.64: Reduced base  strength from 25 to 22. Reduced  intelligence gain from 2.8 to 2.0.  Flesh Golem no longer heals the Undying from dying illusions.
6.45: Reduced Plague movement speed slow from 30% to 25%.
6.68: Increased  Tombstone cast range from 250 to 600.
6.52: Raise Dead Living Deads now have 33% magic resistance. Reduced Living Deads bounty from unknown to unknown. Reduced  Soul Rip cooldown from 30 on each level to 25/20/15/10.
6.72c: Tombstone zombies no longer leave a usable corpse. Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.50: Increased base armor from 1 to 5 (total armor is now 6.4). Reduced Raise Dead Living Deads bounty from unknown to unknown. Changed  Heartstopper Aura damage type from pure to hp removal.
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.79: Increased  Decay strength steal duration from 25/30/35/40 to 40.
6.78: Increased  Soul Rip cast range from 650 to 750.
6.84b: Increased  Soul Rip manacost from 50/75/100/125 to 100/110/120/130.  Tombstone Zombies no longer require two hits to kill from Towers.  Flesh Golem Reduced minimum damage amplification from 5%/10%/15% ( 15%/20%/25%) to 1% ( 1%). Reduced minimum slow from 5% to 1%.
6.75: Decay Increased strength steal duration from 21/24/27/30 to 25/30/35/40. Increased radius from 300 to 325. Zombies'  Deathlust movement and attack speed bonus threshold now also triggers if their target is below 5%/10%/15%/20% health.
6.71: Increased  Flesh Golem movement speed slow from 7% to 9%.
6.73: Reduced  Decay cooldown from 11/9/7/5 to 10/8/6/4. Reduced  Flesh Golem cooldown from 90 to 75.
6.52b: Soul Rip Changed damage type to units within range from magical to hp removal. The damage done to units within range is no longer lethal. Plague Increased cast range from unknown to unknown. Reduced cooldown from 45 to 30.
6.58: Reworked Undying. Changed base attribute from  intelligence to  strength. All his hero stats remain unchanged. Replaced Raise Dead with  Decay.
6.80: Reduced  Soul Rip cooldown from 25/20/15/10 to 24/18/12/6.
6.81: Increased  Soul Rip radius from 975 to 1300.  Tombstone Increased zombies' Deathlust health percentage threshold from 5%/10%/15%/20% to 20%/25%/30%/35%. Zombies no longer give any experience or gold. Increased Tombstone bounty from 70/90/110/130 to 75/100/125/150.  Flesh Golem's Plague Aura now affects spell immune units.
6.82: Increased  Tombstone zombie spawn radius from 400/600/800/1000 to 600/800/1000/1200.  Flesh Golem Now slows between 5% and 15% movement speed, based on the distance to Undying, instead of a static 9% (same scale mechanic as the damage amplification).  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade: Increased minimum damage amplification from 10%/15%/20% to 15%/20%/25%. Increased maximum damage amplification from 25%/30%/35% to 30%/35%/40%.
6.83: Soul Rip Rescaled max unit count from 5/10/15/20 to 10/12/14/16. Rescaled damage/heal per unit from 25 to 18/22/26/30. Increased  Tombstone armor from 4 to 5. Increased  Flesh Golem max slow from 15% to 20%.
6.84: Soul Rip Now sums the damage up into 1 instance, instead of dealing a number of instances. Can no longer be cast on Tombstone Zombies.  Tombstone Zombies now require 1 hero attack or 2 non-hero attacks to be killed, instead of having 30 health.
6.44b: Reduced  strength gain from 2.6 to 2.1. Raise Dead Reduced Living Dead health from 450 to 400. Reduced armor from 0 to -2. Increased bounty from unknown to unknown. Plague Reduced damage amplification from 25%/30%/35% to 20%/25%/30%. Reduced duration from 7/9/11 to 7/8/9.
